meanings.definition: A proportion or share in relation to a whole.
meanings.sent1: She calculated the percentage of students who passed the test.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a discount of 20 percent off all items.
meanings.sent3: The cake was divided into equal percentages for each guest at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her percentage of the project was crucial to its success.
meanings.sent5: The percentage of votes he received was higher than expected.

meanings.definition: A rate, number, or amount in each hundred.
meanings.sent1: The percentage of chocolate chips in the cookie recipe was just right.
meanings.sent2: He scored a high percentage on the math test.
meanings.sent3: The percentage of raindrops on the window made a funny pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a high percentage of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The percentage of flowers in the garden was breathtaking.
